thread.title: Steve Sarkasian's move from Alabama to Atlanta creates social media frenzy | FOX Sports
thread.title_full: Steve Sarkasian's move from Alabama to Atlanta creates social media frenzy | FOX Sports

author: Aaron Torres
title: Steve Sarkasian's move from Alabama to Atlanta creates social media frenzy | FOX Sports
text:
Feb 7, 2017 at 1:45p ET 0Shares 
Steve Sarkisian's stunning decision to leave Alabama to become the Atlanta Falcons' offensive coordinator sent shockwaves through the college football world on Tuesday. The move comes just weeks after Sark took over for Lane Kiffin as the Tide's offensive coordinator prior to the national championship game. 
With Sark packing his bags for Atlanta, Alabama is looking for its third offensive coordinator this calendar year. 
As expected, the internet had some fun with the news. The best reactions from across Twitter: Getty Images Getty Images
